dct_title_s: La récréation Européenne, ou jeu des princes de l'Europe
dct_description_sm: Consists of 61 circular maps of European countries and principalities surrounding a rectangular map of Europe as a whole. Map of Europe (15 x 18 cm.) has title: L'Europe divisée en ses grand états, 1770. Designed as a board game.
dct_publisher_sm: [Paris] : Se vend a Paris chez Crepy rue S. Jacques pres la rue de la parcheminerie a S. Pierre, [1770?]
